original_text: And when his disciples were come to the other side, they had forgotten to take bread.
korean_text: 제자들이 건너편으로 갈새 떡 가져가기를 잊었더니

sentences.original_text: And when his disciples were come to other side,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 제자들이 다른 편에 왔을 때,

sentences.original_text: they had forgotten to take bread.
